description:
Our client is seeking a highly skilled Junior Project Manager to join their dynamic team. The Project Manager will be responsible for overseeing and managing various projects from initiation through completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successful project management, excellent leadership and communication skills, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.

 

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.

 

Location: New Baneshwor, Kathmandu


Key Objective:


> Communicating with clients and defining requirements and project scope

> Ensuring that all projects run smoothly, assembling cross-functional teams of engineers, designers, and more, and working with them to deliver results on-time and on-budget

> Responsible for managing expectations of clients and keeping them happy

> Passionate about project management and make an effort to keep your knowledge up-to-date

> Ensuring full compliance with project management processes and values

> Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate verification techniques

> Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget

> Measure performance using appropriate project management tools and techniques

> Report and escalate to management as needed

> Manage the relationship with the client and relevant stakeholders

> Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress

> Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate verification techniques

> Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate verification techniques
requirements:
• At least 1 year experience in the relevant field
  • Scrum master/PMI Agile Certified Practitioner preferred
  • Past experience working in agile & scrum
  • Past experience managing international clients & leading a team of Project Managers
  • Past experience handling product management would be preferred
  • Required skills/Competencies :
  • Proficient in JIRA
  • Proficient in Confluence, Roadmap, and Release plan tools 
  • Excellent understanding of project management phases
  • Proficient in Release, Capacity, and Iteration planning
  • Solid understanding and implementation of Scrum and Kanban
  • Extensive knowledge of Software Development life cycle
  • In-depth understanding of System Architecture, Databases, Process, and Data flow
  • Strong conceptual understanding and implementation of testing methodologies
  • Proficient in Automated Testing Tools and Strategies
  • Proficient in version control repository GIT, CI/CD tools, and best practices
  • Strong team management and leadership skills
  • Analytical/problem-solving skills
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills


Benefits

  • Full-time, permanent position.
  • Competitive Salary.
  • SSF
  • Vacation & Sick leave.
  • Ten paid holidays per year.
  • Relaxed work environment.
  • Learning environment.
responsibilities:
• Identify and engage project-relevant stakeholders
  • Define and work on requirements with cross-functional teams
  • Lead cross-functional project teams and manage work assignments
  • Provide strategic insight and communication on project management processes
  • Monitor and manage resource availability and allocation
  • Ensure clear project goals and timelines
  • Provide project estimation, planning, and budgeting
  • Oversee project risk and issue management
  • Foster a productive and innovative project management environment
  • Lead project management team through standardization and change management
  • Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
  • Coach and mentor team members
  • Delegate project tasks based on team members' strengths and skills
  • Track project management team performance
  • Participate in hiring and interview processes
  • Contribute to regular team meetings and updates
  • Provide general administrative support
  • Continue professional development

description:
As an Associate, you will play a crucial role in supporting the overall operations of the company. You will work closely with the Manager and other team members to ensure the seamless execution of projects. This role requires a combination of organizational skills, communication abilities, and a proactive mindset to navigate the complexities of international product sourcing.


The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.


Send us your resume at hr@talentsathi.com


Location: Balwatar, Kathmandu


Working hours: 9 am - 5 pm
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in English.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software tools.
  • Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Knowledge of international trade regulations and logistics is a plus
responsibilities:
1. Executive Support:

● Manage the CEO's schedule, including meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.

● Prepare and review documents, reports, and presentations for the CEO.

● Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism.

● Serve as the point of contact between the CEO and internal/external stakeholders.


2. Communication Management:

● Draft and manage correspondence on behalf of the CEO.

● Facilitate effective communication within the organization and with external partners.

● Coordinate and prepare for executive meetings, including taking minutes and following up on action items.


3. Strategic Assistance:

● Assist in the development and implementation of strategic

initiatives.

● Conduct research and provide insights on market trends,

competitors, and potential business opportunities.

● Help in the preparation and analysis

Project Management:

● Oversee and manage special projects as directed by the CEO.

● Ensure projects are on track, deadlines are met, and objectives are achieved.

● Coordinate with different departments to gather necessary information and resources for projects.


4. Operational Support:

● Improve operational processes and procedures to enhance efficiency and productivity.

● Assist in budgeting, financial reporting, and resource allocation.

● Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular updates to the CEO.


5. Relationship Management:

● Build and maintain relationships with key clients, suppliers, and business partners.

● Represent the CEO in meetings and events when necessary.

● Facilitate networking opportunities for the CEO and the organization.


6. Problem Solving:

● Identify issues and challenges within the organization and propose solutions.

● Act as a sounding board for the CEO on various business matters.

● Address and resolve any administrative or operational problems promptly.


7. Confidentiality and Discretion:

  • Maintain the highest level of confidentiality and integrity in handling sensitive company information.
  • Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures, as well as relevant legal regulations.
  • By efficiently managing these responsibilities, an assistant to the CEO can significantly contribute to the company's success, particularly in a dynamic and fast-paced industry like sourcing and procurement.


8. Documentation and Record Keeping

• Manage and organize sourcing-related documents, including contracts, invoices, and product specifications.

• Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of supplier information, negotiations, and agreements.


9. Quality Control

• Collaborate with the Quality Control team to ensure that products meet specified quality standards.

• Monitor and report on production progress and address any quality concerns promptly.


10. Logistics Coordination

  • Work with logistics partners to coordinate shipping schedules and track the movement of goods.
  • Assist in resolving any shipping or customs-related issues to ensure timely delivery.


11. Client Support

• Provide support to clients by addressing inquiries, providing updates, and ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.

• Collaborate with the Sales team to understand client requirements and communicate effectively with all stakeholders.

description:
Our client is seeking a skilled and experienced PHP Developer with knowledge of web development to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our e-commerce stores, with a specific focus on the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform. While prior experience with Shopify and bigcommerce is not required, the ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of web development basics and a willingness to learn and excel.

 

Location - Maitrinagar


Working hour - 9am -6pm


Lunch provided

Good holidays
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional web development experience
  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including PHP and responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with Shopify is preferred, but not required. Willingness to learn and master the Shopify platform is essential
  • Experience in building and customizing websites using content management systems (CMS)
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently
  • Knowledge of web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track website performance and user behavior
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment

 

This is a full-time position located at our office, where you will receive training and guidance on using Shopify & Bigcommerce effectively. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a fast-paced and innovative environment.


If you are a motivated web developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and expand your skills by learning and leveraging the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform to create exceptional online experiences for our customers.


Apply: You can send your resume at career@talentsathi.com.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain e-commerce websites, with a primary focus on the Shopify platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and project managers, to implement website changes, updates, and new features
  • Customize and configure Shopify & Bigcommerce themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific project requirements and business needs
  • Ensure websites are optimized for performance, responsiveness, and SEO best practices
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any front-end and back-end issues that arise, including compatibility and functionality problems
  • Perform regular website maintenance tasks, such as monitoring site performance, managing content updates, and resolving technical glitches or bugs
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies related to web development, PHP, and e-commerce
  • Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and propose innovative ideas to improve user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance
  • Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers or team members as needed
  • Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the website's functionality and compatibility across different browsers and devices

requirements:

  • Experience in managing moderate to large-scale Facebook and PPC campaigns.
  • Strong understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategies, and best practices.
  • Experience in Facebook ads, PPC, Email marketing, and social media.

responsibilities:

  • Conduct keyword research and selection for pay-per-click campaigns and SEO projects.


  • Analyze performance data and provide intelligent synthesis, interpretation, and appropriate action plans based on conclusions.


  • Communicate with team members and clients regularly to discuss strategy, adjust media plans, and provide a comprehensive campaign overview.


  • Manage campaign expenses, stay on budget, estimate monthly costs, and reconcile discrepancies.


  • Monitor and administer web analytics dashboards, reports, and key reporting tools, and point out key areas of importance in accordance with client goals.


  • Provide creative copy suggestions and graphical ad templates.


  • Assist in the management of Display network placement lists on Facebook and Google Ads and through other contextual advertising platforms.


  • Support the generation of new paid search campaigns, ad groups, and accounts and aid in the creation of new paid search marketing initiatives.

In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our e-commerce stores, with a specific focus on the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform. While prior experience with Shopify and bigcommerce is not required, the ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of web development basics and a willingness to learn and excel.

 

Location - Maitrinagar


Working hour - 9am -6pm


Lunch provided

Good holidays
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional web development experience
  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript and responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with Shopify is preferred, but not required. Willingness to learn and master the Shopify platform is essential
  • Experience in building and customizing websites using content management systems (CMS)
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently
  • Knowledge of web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track website performance and user behavior
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment

 

This is a full-time position located at our office, where you will receive training and guidance on using Shopify & Bigcommerce effectively. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a fast-paced and innovative environment.

If you are a motivated web developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and expand your skills by learning and leveraging the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform to create exceptional online experiences for our customers.


Note: Candidates with experience in any Frontend or Backend, programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, HTML CSS, or others can apply.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain e-commerce websites, with a primary focus on the Shopify platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and project managers, to implement website changes, updates, and new features
  • Customize and configure Shopify & Bigcommerce themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific project requirements and business needs
  • Ensure websites are optimized for performance, responsiveness, and SEO best practices
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any front-end and back-end issues that arise, including compatibility and functionality problems
  • Perform regular website maintenance tasks, such as monitoring site performance, managing content updates, and resolving technical glitches or bugs
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies related to web development, PHP, and e-commerce
  • Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and propose innovative ideas to improve user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance
  • Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers or team members as needed
  • Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the website's functionality and compatibility across different browsers and devices

description:
Our client is looking for a talented and detail-oriented Quality Assurance Engineer to join their client’s team. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in software testing, a good understanding of testing methodologies, and the ability to work collaboratively within a team.

Working hours: 8 hrs per day,  6:30 A.M to 2:30 PM Nepal Time -6 days a week

 

Type: Remote
requirements:
• 2-3 years of experience in software quality assurance.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Proficiency in QA tools and technologies such as Selenium, JIRA, and version control systems like Git.
  • Experience with test automation frameworks and scripting languages (e.g., Python, Java, C#).
  • Strong experience in manual testing.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Good communication skills, both verbal and written.
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodologies.
  • Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality.

 

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Relevant certifications such as ISTQB or CSTE.
  • Experience with performance testing tools like JMeter.
  • Experience with testing in cloud environments (e.g., AWS, Azure).
responsibilities:
• Develop, document, and execute detailed test plans, test cases, and test scripts for various applications.
  • Perform thorough manual testing to ensure software functionality, usability, and reliability.
  • Contribute to the development and maintenance of automated test scripts using appropriate tools and frameworks.
  • Identify, document, and track software defects using bug tracking tools, and collaborate with developers to resolve issues.
  • Review and analyze requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
  • Work closely with cross-functional teams including developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle (SDLC).
  • Create and maintain detailed test reports, summarizing test results and providing insights into product quality.

description:
As an Ads Media Buyer & Shopify Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing our advertising campaigns across various platforms and managing our client's  Shopify storefront. Your primary goal will be to optimize ad spend to maximize ROI and enhance their online store's performance.

 The company(Australian based)  is the forefront of e-commerce innovation. They are looking for a skilled Ads Media Buyer & Shopify Manager to enhance our digital marketing efforts and manage their online store. This role is perfect for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and is passionate about data-driven decision making and e-commerce marketing.

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.

Experience: 1-2 year

Location: Remote(Work from home)

Time: 8am-4pm
requirements:
• Proven experience in digital marketing with a focus on Facebook Ads management and Shopify administration.
  • In-depth knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager, Shopify platform, and related marketing tools.
  • Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, analyze campaign performance, and derive actionable insights.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to articulate ideas, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and interact with clients.
responsibilities:
1. Work with our Marketing Consultant to manage ads across Facebook, and Instagram.
  2. Analyze campaign data daily to make informed decisions on ad adjustments and budget allocation.
  3. Manage and optimize our Shopify store for increased traffic and sales conversion.
  4. Collaborate with teams to align ads with ongoing marketing strategies and promotional activities.
  5. Keep abreast of the latest trends in e-commerce marketing and platform capabilities.
  6. Prepare detailed reports on campaign performance, insights, and learnings.

Position Title: CEO's Executive Assistant (CEA)

Overview: The CEO's Executive Coordinator plays a pivotal role in supporting the CEO of our dynamic tech startup. This individual will be responsible for managing various administrative tasks, providing strategic support, and ensuring seamless communication within the organization.
requirements:
Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in business administration, information technology, communications, or related field. (result awaiting can aply too)
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with a keen attention to detail.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and other productivity tools.
  • Demonstrated ability to exercise sound judgment, discretion, and professionalism in handling confidential information.
  • Resourcefulness, adaptability, and a proactive mindset in problem-solving and decision-making.
  • Familiarity with the tech industry and a passion for innovation and entrepreneurship.

Note: NO BAR for VERY interested/enthusiast candidates who want to work in a dynamic startup and evolve in their Entrepreneurship journey.
responsibilities:
1. Executive Support: Provide high-level administrative support to the CEO, including managing calendars, scheduling meetings, and coordinating travel arrangements.
  2. Communication Management: Serve as a primary point of contact for internal and external stakeholders, managing emails, calls, and correspondence on behalf of the CEO.
  3. Strategic Assistance: Assist the CEO in preparing presentations, reports, and documents for internal meetings, investor pitches, and external engagements.
  4. Project Coordination: Coordinate and track progress on key projects and initiatives, ensuring deadlines are met and objectives are achieved.
  5. Meeting Facilitation: Prepare agendas, take minutes, and follow up on action items for executive meetings, fostering effective communication and collaboration across teams.
  6. Research and Analysis: Conduct market research, gather competitive intelligence, and analyze industry trends to support decision-making and strategic planning.
  7. Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with team members, investors, partners, and other stakeholders to facilitate the CEO's engagement and networking efforts.
  8. Confidentiality and Discretion: Handle sensitive information with the utmost confidentiality and discretion, maintaining a high level of professionalism at all times.
  9. Operational Support: Assist in the day-to-day operations of the CEO's office, including budget management, expense tracking, and office logistics.
  10. Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to streamline processes, improve efficiency, and enhance the effectiveness of executive support services.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary and benefits package
  • Opportunity for professional growth and development
  • Dynamic and collaborative work environment
  • Chance to make a significant impact in a rapidly growing startup

Join us in shaping the future of technology and entrepreneurship! Apply now to become a key member of our team as the CEO's Executive Coordinator.

Additionally applicant should have/be:

  • Vehicle License and two wheeler.
  • Own laptop (atleast initially during probation period)
  • Reside within Kathmandu district (KTM valley)

The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successful project management, excellent leadership and communication skills, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Location: New Baneshwor, Kathmandu

> Communicating with clients and defining requirements and project scope
> Ensuring that all projects run smoothly, assembling cross-functional teams of engineers, designers, and more, and working with them to deliver results on-time and on-budget
> Responsible for managing expectations of clients and keeping them happy

> Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using appropriate verification techniques
requirements:

  • Past experience handling product management would be preferred
  • Required skills/Competencies :
  • Proficient in JIRA

  • Proficient in Automated Testing Tools and Strategies
  • Proficient in version control repository GIT, CI/CD tools, and best practices

Benefits

  • Full-time, permanent position.
  • Competitive Salary.
  • SSF
  • Vacation & Sick leave.
  • Ten paid holidays per year.
  • Relaxed work environment.
  • Learning environment.
responsibilities:

  • Provide strategic insight and communication on project management processes
  • Monitor and manage resource availability and allocation
  • Ensure clear project goals and timelines
  • Provide project estimation, planning, and budgeting
  • Oversee project risk and issue management
  • Foster a productive and innovative project management environment

  • Delegate project tasks based on team members' strengths and skills
  • Track project management team performance

  • Contribute to regular team meetings and updates
  • Provide general administrative support
  • Continue professional development

description:
Our client is seeking a talented Full Stack Software Developer proficient in Java and React to join their dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for software development, strong problem-solving skills, and a collaborative mindset. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining both frontend and backend components of our web applications.

 

Our client is an Australian based company who understands the challenges property managers face in juggling various tools and systems to handle their day-to-day operations. That's why they've crafted a comprehensive end-to-end solution to streamline property managers tech stack, eliminating stress and hassle from their workflows.

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.

 

Working hours: 6:30 A.M to 2:30 PM Nepal Time
requirements:
- Minimum 1 years of professional experience in Java, Spring, Spring boot
- Knowledge of core Java and programming
- Knowledge about REST API and MongoDB
- Deep knowledge and proven experience in Spring boot and java 17
- Good to have knowledge about React.js, Bubble.io or willing to learn
50% will be frontend development with bubble and 50% will be backend development
Should have experience and be in love with Bubble.io or Willing to learn bubble front end tool
- Good concept of Design patterns and their implementation
- Good concept of enterprise-level software development (Advanced) is desirable
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills, comfortable with client communication
- Good leadership skills - ability to motivate and mentor team members, ability to plan and make sound decisions, ability to negotiate tactfully with the client and team
- Good knowledge of HTML, CSS, script, Database and web application security
- Ability to write Unit and Integration Tests
- Experience/Knowledge of working with CI/CD pipelines
- Results-oriented, customer-focused with a passion for resolving tough technical and operational challenges.
- Possess excellent analytical and problem solving abilities
- Good documentation skills (API Documentation, Deployment Documents, Application Architecture Documents etc.)
- Highly experienced with Agile methodologies like Scrum/Kanban
responsibilities:
- Take complete ownership of the project life cycle, including analysis, design, development, deployment, and ongoing maintenance.
- Ensure the creation of modular, reusable, and high-quality code by implementing Test-Driven Development (TDD), conducting code reviews, and adhering to best practices.
- Collaborate with technology experts to make architectural decisions and maintain comprehensive technical documentation.
- Proactively engage in project risk analysis and mitigation, consistently review issues to identify root causes, and implement preventive measures.
- Guarantee the scalability, performance, reliability, and security of the application.
- Recognize training needs, coordinate training sessions, and mentor team members for their career growth.
- Actively participate in instilling and upholding organizational culture, processes, and standards.
- Stay current with the ever-changing technology landscape.
- Collect and analyze business requirements, comprehend the client's business perspective, and collaborate with the project manager and client to plan the product roadmap.
- Motivate and lead team members, fostering a culture of learning and achieving both project and departmental goals.

description:
Our client is seeking a talented Junior-Level WordPress/Shopify Developer to join their team. They are looking for the  ideal candidate who has a strong understanding of WordPress development and customization, as well as experience working with plugins and themes. This is an exciting career opportunity for a WordPress/Shopify Developer to join their team of marketing professionals.

Our client is an Australian digital marketing agency growing rapidly. They're currently interviewing for a WordPress/Shopify Developer to improve and maintain new and existing websites for both our valued, long-standing clients and new clients. Supported by highly experienced management and a team of digital marketing and design professionals you will put your developer skills to work every day on a variety of projects and brands. You’ll apply both technical and practical thinking to meet our clients’ briefs and exceed their expectations. Majority of new web builds will be designs from Figma mock-ups, and you will be responsible for the development and performance of the website.

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.

 

The work is in line with AEST (GMT+10) from 9am - 5:30pm.
requirements:
• Minimum 2 years’ experience as a WordPress Developer.
  • Advanced WordPress knowledge
  • Understanding of plugin integration, API integrations, Elementor Pro, ACF Custom Fields, and Gutenburg.
  • Comfortable working across common CMS's such as WordPress, Shopify, and React (not preferred)
  • Experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP.
  • Thorough understanding of Data layers, APIs and web infrastructure.
  • Solid understanding and ability to execute responsive websites following a clear set of Figma designs.
  • Each website will consist of bespoke templates that are designed in Figma, each template must have the ability to be updated, restructured and replicable to build out the sitemap.
  • Each website must boast a Lighthouse report of 90+ on both mobile and desktop, SEO optimised, and be responsive to all devices.
  • Stack testing on all devices is required.
  • Website and plugin code maintenance and upgrades.
  • Identify and resolve any bugs.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Efficient turnaround time

 

What's in it for you?

Amazing work culture with a rapidly growing company.
Competitive salary structure.
Salary Scaling with tenure.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain WordPress websites for our clients, ensuring high performance, security, and scalability.
  • Customize WordPress themes and plugins to meet client requirements.
  • Collaborate with design and marketing teams to implement website features and enhancements.
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues related to WordPress websites.
  • Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in WordPress development.

description:
PropertyStack is seeking a talented Mid-Level UX/UI Designer to join our innovative team. This role offers the opportunity to significantly impact our digital products by designing intuitive, engaging user interfaces and experiences. The ideal candidate will have a robust understanding of Adobe Creative Cloud, Figma, and current design best practices. You will be responsible for creating visual elements, iconography, and entire app interfaces, applying product and color theory knowledge, and using psychological principles to influence user behavior and enhance user satisfaction.

We value self-motivation and the ability to work independently, as well as collaboratively, to meet project deadlines and objectives. requirements:

  7. Education: A degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, User Experience Design, or a related field is preferred, though substantial professional experience can substitute for formal education.

We are looking for a candidate who not only meets these technical and professional standards but also fits well within our dynamic, collaborative culture.
responsibilities:

  2. Develop Iconography and Graphics: Design clear and compelling icons and graphics tailored to the specific needs of the PropertyStack platform.

  4. Strategic Feature Planning: Work collaboratively with product management and engineering teams to plan and integrate user-centric features into the product roadmap.
  5. Enhance User Experience: Continuously evaluate and enhance the user experience by implementing effective design strategies that address user needs and business goals.
  6. Apply Product and Color Theory: Integrate principles of product and color theory to improve interface design and usability.

jobTitle: Night Shift Experience Sales and Support Staff
description:
We are currently seeking experienced and dedicated Night Shift Sales and Support Staff to join our team. As a member of our night shift team, you will play a crucial role in providing exceptional sales assistance and customer support during non-traditional hours. This position requires individuals with a strong background in sales, customer service, and technical skills, as well as the ability to work independently during the night shift.
Work Day: Monday to Saturday
Work Time : 10 PM  to 6 AM
requirements:
• Minimum of 3 years of experience in sales, customer service, or a related field, preferably in a night shift environment.
  • Ability to work independently and efficiently during non-traditional hours (10 PM to 6 AM).
  • Strong computer skills with proficiency in using CRM systems and other sales software tools.
  • Basic technical knowledge to troubleshoot and assist customers with technical issues related to our products or services.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a customer-focused mindset and the ability to build rapport with customers over the phone, email, or chat.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging situations calmly and professionally.
  • Detail-oriented with the ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and schedules, including occasional overtime or weekend shifts as required.
responsibilities:
• Handle inbound and outbound sales inquiries and customer support requests during the night shift hours (10 PM to 6 AM).
  • Assist customers in navigating through our products or services, providing information, and addressing any questions or concerns they may have.
  • Utilize our CRM system to manage customer interactions, update customer records, and track sales activities accurately.
  • Proactively identify sales opportunities and promote products or services to meet customers' needs and exceed sales targets.
  • Resolve customer issues and complaints promptly and professionally, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and retention.
  • Collaborate closely with other team members and departments to escalate complex issues and provide timely resolutions.
  • Stay updated on product knowledge, sales techniques, and company policies to effectively communicate with customers and drive sales performance.
  • Maintain detailed records of sales interactions and customer inquiries for reporting and analysis purposes.

requirements:

– Minimum 1.5-2+ years of experience in relevant tech stack (ReactJS)
– Minimum 1+ years of experience developing ReactJS applications using TypeScript
– Strong knowledge and skills in the following technologies:
– Languages: JavaScript and TypeScript
– Framework: ReactJS
– Libraries: Redux, RxJS
– Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS, SCSS
– Experience writing tests and Continuous Integration
– Ability to build and maintain positive working relationships with stakeholders of various levels
– Excellent attention to detail and willingness to learn new software/processes

– Able to work calmly and effectively under pressure

– Open to taking on new challenges
– Proficient in communication in English (both written and verbal)
– Excellent communication skills for inter-team collaborations including engineers and designers

– Knowledge and experience implementing Atomic Design Pattern
– Knowledge and understanding of AWS Services
– Knowledge and experience with GIS Technologies
– Experience working with libraries such as Cesium, OpenLayers, WebGL (3D Rendering), Three.js
– Proactive and able to be self-managed

 

5 days working days (Monday - Friday)

responsibilities:

description: As a Marketing Manager at our digital agency, you will be the superhero behind promoting our services and making sure the world knows about the awesome things we do. You'll be the captain of the marketing ship, steering our brand to success in the digital seas.
requirements:
1. Experience Explorer: 1+ years in marketing, especially in the digital realm. We need someone who's been around the block and knows the ins and outs of the digital landscape.

  2. Strategic Sage: A strategic mindset with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies. You've got the vision to see the big picture and the skills to make it happen.

  3. Communication Champ: Excellent communication skills – both written and spoken. You can craft compelling messages and inspire others to get on board.

  4. Team Whisperer: Experience in leading and managing a marketing team. You know how to bring out the best in people and foster a collaborative, creative environment.

  5. Data Dexterity: Proficiency in using analytics tools. You're not afraid of numbers; in fact, you love them and can turn data into actionable insights.

  6. Tech Savvy: Familiarity with the latest digital marketing tools and trends. You're not intimidated by technology – you embrace it and use it to your advantage.
responsibilities:
1. Strategy Guru: Develop and execute mind-blowing marketing strategies. Think of yourself as the architect of our success – plan, implement, and tweak strategies to ensure we stand out in the digital world.

  2. Content Commander: Oversee the creation of captivating content. From social media posts to blog articles, you'll be the chief storyteller, making sure our message is clear, compelling, and hard to ignore.

  3. Team Maestro: Lead a team of marketing enthusiasts. Your role is like conducting a symphony – everyone has their part, and you make sure the melody is harmonious. Provide guidance, support, and maybe a bit of cheerleading.

  4. Data Detective: Dive into analytics to uncover hidden insights. Numbers are your sidekick – use them to track the success of our campaigns, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

  5. Tech Trailblazer: Stay on top of digital marketing trends and tools. You're the trailblazer, testing out new tech and strategies to keep us ahead of the curve.

  6. Brand Guardian: Protect and enhance our brand. You're the gatekeeper, ensuring consistency in our messaging and visuals across all platforms.
